author: Krischelle Marie
text: As someone who suffered from having breakouts, dealing with the hyperpigmentation that was left on my skin; and being able to try almost all skincare brands available in the market, it really takes a lot of effort to know which product or even particular ingredient works or not

author: Krischelle Marie
text: Consistency and Patience are important if you really want to have healthier skin. Being mindful of what you eat and/or drink too.

author: Krischelle Marie
text: I am not blessed with "good skin". I have acne-prone/combination skin type with textures so I have to be consistent with my skincare routine.

author: Krischelle Marie
text: I am so proud of myself because I have been consistently doing my night time skin care routine for more than a week now 😍

text: I rarely take photographs. But this one is of the rare moments that I took a clear one, and it vividly tells me that all that I have now are memories.

author: Krischelle Marie
text: Photo taken around 2013. I just remembered how our grandmother, Mommy Lina would ask us to accompany her here. Afterwards, we will stroll along Escolta. https://t.co/GyePUAjy9o
